sentence: Skinner, who previously worked on top consumer-oriented cases under Arizona Attorney General Mark Brnovich, argues the taxpayer-funded contracts between state governments and these firms often lack basic ethics protections that should be part of all outside-counsel contracts.
author: RealClearWire
title: Report: State Contracts Boost Dem-Linked Lawyers, Not Consumers

sentence: O incluso el fiscal general de Arizona, Mark Brnovich, quien busca una curul en el Senado federal, ha presionado por que el gobernador de ese estado, Doug Ducey, responda con una fuerza militar contra lo que él llama erróneamente una “invasión” de inmigrantes por la frontera sur.
title: Trump y los republicanos aceitan su maquinaria de mentiras

sentence: President Trump released another statement yesterday blasting the Arizona Attorney General, Mark Brnovich, on his failure to prosecute the Maricopa County Supervisors for the rigged 2020 election and their ongoing failure to comply with his criminal investigation.
author: Jordan Conradson
title: President Trump Tells Arizona Attorney General Mark Brnovich To Issue Warrants In 2020 Election Fraud Case: “The Supervisors Just Won’t Release The Information—It Must Really Be Bad!”
